name: Five Hundred (500) (itch)
description:
Play the Australian-version of the classic 500 card game.

Features include:

  • Play against competitive AI in single player
  • Play with or against one or more friends in multiplayer
  • Cross platform play against Android and iOS users
  • Misere and Open Misere bids supported!
  •  In-depth tutorial to teach you how to play
  •  Statistics to track your success
